result.value:
A Package for reproducing the results of the publication: 
Weinholdt, Claus, Henri Wichmann, Johanna Kotrba, David H. Ardell, Matthias Kappler, Alexander W. Eckert, Dirk Vordermark, and Ivo Grosse. __'Prediction of regulatory targets of alternative isoforms of the epidermal growth factor receptor in a glioblastoma cell line'__ BMC bioinformatics 20, no. 1 (2019): 1-14. https://bmcbioinformatics.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s12859-019-2944-9 

The datasets analyzed during the current study are available in the BGSC repository. The raw data files are in the folder [rawdata](./rawdata/) including the [Einzelanalyse_nonorm_nobkgd_SF767-1.txt.gz](./rawdata/Einzelanalyse_nonorm_nobkgd_SF767-1.txt.gz) and [ControlProbeProfile_SF767-1.txt.gz](./rawdata/ControlProbeProfile_SF767-1.txt.gz). 
The lists of genes predicted for all of the four classes can be found in the folder [PredectionResult](./PredectionResult/)
The [Reproducible Script](./ReproducibleScript.md) can be used to reproduce the results and plots of this work.

YEAR: 2018
COPYRIGHT HOLDER: Your name goes here

result.description:
Weinholdt, Claus, Henri Wichmann, Johanna Kotrba, David H. Ardell, Matthias Kappler, Alexander W. Eckert, Dirk Vordermark, and Ivo Grosse. __'Prediction of regulatory targets of alternative isoforms of the epidermal growth factor receptor in a glioblastoma cell line'__ BMC bioinformatics 20, no. 1 (2019): 1-14. https://bmcbioinformatics.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s12859-019-2944-9

The datasets analyzed during the current study are available in the BGSC repository. The raw data files are in the folder [rawdata](https://github.com/GrosseLab/BGSC/blob/master/rawdata/) including the [Einzelanalyse_nonorm_nobkgd_SF767-1.txt.gz](https://github.com/GrosseLab/BGSC/blob/master/rawdata/Einzelanalyse_nonorm_nobkgd_SF767-1.txt.gz) and [ControlProbeProfile_SF767-1.txt.gz](https://github.com/GrosseLab/BGSC/blob/master/rawdata/ControlProbeProfile_SF767-1.txt.gz). 
The lists of genes predicted for all of the four classes can be found in the folder [PredectionResult](https://github.com/GrosseLab/BGSC/blob/master/PredectionResult/).


### Script for reproducing the results
The [Reproducible Script](https://github.com/GrosseLab/BGSC/blob/master/ReproducibleScript.md) can be used to reproduce the results and plots of this work.

The datasets analyzed during the current study are available in the BGSC repository. The raw data files are in the folder [rawdata](https://github.com/GrosseLab/BGSC/blob/master/rawdata/) including the [Einzelanalyse_nonorm_nobkgd_SF767-1.txt.gz](https://github.com/GrosseLab/BGSC/blob/master/rawdata/Einzelanalyse_nonorm_nobkgd_SF767-1.txt.gz) and [ControlProbeProfile_SF767-1.txt.gz](https://github.com/GrosseLab/BGSC/blob/master/rawdata/ControlProbeProfile_SF767-1.txt.gz). 
The lists of genes predicted for all of the four classes can be found in the folder [PredectionResult](https://github.com/GrosseLab/BGSC/blob/master/PredectionResult/).


### Script for reproducing the results
The [Reproducible Script](https://github.com/GrosseLab/BGSC/blob/master/ReproducibleScript.md) can be used to reproduce the results and plots of this work.

The raw data files are [Einzelanalyse_nonorm_nobkgd_SF767-1.txt.gz](https://github.com/GrosseLab/BGSC/blob/master/Einzelanalyse_nonorm_nobkgd_SF767-1.txt.gz) and [ControlProbeProfile_SF767-1.txt.gz](https://github.com/GrosseLab/BGSC/blob/master/ControlProbeProfile_SF767-1.txt.gz).
